tracks.title: Sam Feldt ft. Kimberly Anne - Show Me Love (EDX's Indian Summer Remix)
tracks.description: "Radioactive" is a song recorded by American rock band Imagine Dragons for their major-label debut EP Continued Silence and later on their debut studio album, Night Visions (2012), as the opening track. "Radioactive" was first sent to modern rock radio on October 29, 2012,[1] and released to contemporary radio on April 9, 2013. Musically, "Radioactive" is an alternative rock song with elements of electronic rock and contains cryptic lyrics about apocalyptic and revolutionist themes.

tracks.title: Sam Feldt - Show Me Love (EDX's Indian Summer Remix)
tracks.description: Amsterdam's Sam Feldt earned attention in Europe and then worldwide for his melodic house remixes, mixtapes, and collaborations including 2014's "Bloesem" with De Hofnar and "Hot Skin" with Kav Verhouzer on... Dutch label Spinnin' Records. After a series of live shows in Europe, which he built over time to contain mostly his own productions, he toured North America for the first time in early 2015. "Midnight Hearts" with the Him featuring ANG13 followed soon...

tracks.title: James Bay - Let It Go (Bearson Remix)
tracks.description: A soulful singer/songwriter from a small English town with a penchant for crafting moving and evocative folk-pop confections in the vein of Ed Sheeran, Foy Vance, and Ben Howard, James Bay hails from the North Hertf...shire market town of Hitchin. Bay honed his skills regionally, eventually landing high-exposure support slots with Tom Odell, John Newman, and Kodaline before inking a record deal with Republic/Universal in 2012.
